Line Item description (company language): Represents the change in reported amounts resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates from those in effect in the comparable prior year period for operating results.

We offer programs that enable sellers to grow their businesses, sell their products in our stores, and fulfill orders using our services, earning fixed fees, a percentage of sales, per-unit activity fees, interest, or some combination thereof, for our seller programs.
AWS offers a broad set of on-demand technology services, including compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning, and other services to developers and enterprises of all sizes.
Advertising services (4) includes sales of advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others, through programs such as sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

Subscription services (5) includes annual and monthly fees associated with Amazon Prime memberships, as well as digital video, audiobook, digital music, e-book, and other non-AWS subscription services.
Physical stores (2) includes sales from our physical store locations, which as of December 31, 2024, included 618 North America and 27 International stores.
